sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Nike ( NKE ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.1%.
Year to date, Nike registers a 31.1% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Travelers Companies ( TRV ), trading down 1.9%.
Travelers Companies is lower by about 5.9% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are UnitedHealth Group ( UNH ), trading down 1.5%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 1.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
